targets.query: SELECT sum("count") AS "count", mean("avg") AS "average time", mean("pct90.0") AS "90%", mean("pct95.0") AS "95%", mean("pct99.0") AS "99%", mean("count")/$send_interval AS "rps", min("min"), max("max"), sum("rb")/sum("count") as "Recieve Bytes/request", sum("sb")/sum("count") as "Send Bytes/request" FROM jmeter WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/   AND "statut"='all') AND "testRun"=~/^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction" fill(0)

SELECT sum("error")/sum("all") AS "% Errors" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "all" FROM jmeter WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" != 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"), (SELECT sum("count") AS "error" FROM jmeter WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "statut"='ko') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction") GROUP BY "transaction" fill(0)
SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/
SELECT max("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))

SELECT mean("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND "transaction"=~/^$TopRps$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND "transaction"!~/^$TopRps$/ AND  "transaction"!='all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"=~/^$TopAvg$/ GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"!~/^$TopAvg$/ and "transaction"!='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"=~/^$Top90$/ GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"!~/^$Top90$/ and "transaction"!='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"=~/^$Top95$/ GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"!~/^$Top95$/ and "transaction"!='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pct99.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"=~/^$Top99$/ GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("pct99.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"!~/^$Top99$/ and "transaction"!='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct99.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter AND "transaction"='all' GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE  ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rb") FROM "$measurement_name"  WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") AS "error count" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction","responseCode","responseMessage"
SELECT * FROM test9 WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/  AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Error Info (Show when the listener is on)

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$request$/ AND "statut" = 'all')  AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$request$/ AND "statut" = 'ko')  AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name"  WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$request$/ AND "statut" = 'all')  AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("count") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$request$/ AND "statut" = 'ko')  AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))
SELECT last("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$request$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum("count") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$request$/ AND "statut" = 'ko')  AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$request$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct50.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$request$/ AND ("statut" = 'ok' or "statut" = 'ko')) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$request$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$request$/)  AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct99.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$request$/)  AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("max") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$request$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("testRun") from (select "text", "testRun" from events where "application"=~/^$project$/) ORDER BY DESC LIMIT $limit
list.label: Test Runs
list.name: run
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("testRun") from (select "text", "testRun" from events where "application"=~/^$project$/) ORDER BY DESC LIMIT $limit

list.definition: SELECT distinct("transaction") from (select "min", "transaction" from jmeter where "application"=~/^$project$/ and "testRun"=~/^$run$/)
list.label: Request
list.name: request
list.query: SELECT distinct("transaction") from (select "min", "transaction" from jmeter where "application"=~/^$project$/ and "testRun"=~/^$run$/)

list.definition: SELECT  "transaction" , top("Mean", 5)FROM (SELECT mean("count") / $send_interval AS "Mean" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "application" =~ /^$project$/ AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND "transaction"!='all' GROUP BY "transaction")
list.label: toprps
list.name: TopRps

list.definition: SELECT  "transaction" , top("Mean", 5) FROM (SELECT mean("avg") AS "Mean" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$project$/) AND "testRun" =~ /^$run$/ AND "transaction"!='all'  GROUP BY "transaction")
list.label: topavg
